about_the_game:
One day, a meteorite brought to Earth a poisonous slime that infects everything in its path in order to populate the planet with inhabitants from deep space.
Together with your friends you will face monsters to protect your farm and defend the invaders.
Build traps, catch monsters and do not be afraid, because your friends rely on you.

This is a multiplayer, third-person, voxel style game. A combination of Tower Defence and Horror genres. Every single time the world is different. Died? Start again!

Resources

Chop down trees, mine rocks, kill monsters to get their hearts - crystals from the depths of the galaxy with special effects. You need them a lot to build your traps!

Traps

Protect your farm with a variety of traps ranging from simple spikes to more deadly traps. Have you ever thought that a piece of meteorite could be so brilliant that night turns into day? You can use it to build special traps, because some of the monsters are very light-sensitive.

Monsters

Every night monsters come out to hunt. What a coincidence! You've got plenty of cows and sheep! They love fresh meat! There are a lot of them and they are different!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel with at least 4 cores
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD / Intel with 6 cores
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 2060 / Radeon RX 5600
  • DirectX: Version 11
